executeSellEthForToken(address,address,a.details: Calls `sellEthForToken` on the given `provider` contract to      trigger a trade.

params.auxiliaryData: Auxiliary data supplied to the `provider` contract.
params.minBuyAmount: The minimum acceptable amount of `outputToken` to buy.
params.provider: The address of the on-chain liquidity provider.
params.recipient: The recipient of the bought tokens.

executeSellTokenForEth(address,address,a.details: Calls `sellTokenForEth` on the given `provider` contract to      trigger a trade.

params.auxiliaryData: Auxiliary data supplied to the `provider` contract.
params.minBuyAmount: The minimum acceptable amount of ETH to buy.
params.provider: The address of the on-chain liquidity provider.
params.recipient: The recipient of the bought tokens.

executeSellTokenForToken(address,address.details: Calls `sellTokenForToken` on the given `provider` contract to      trigger a trade.

params.auxiliaryData: Auxiliary data supplied to the `provider` contract.
params.minBuyAmount: The minimum acceptable amount of `outputToken` to buy.
params.provider: The address of the on-chain liquidity provider.
params.recipient: The recipient of the bought tokens.
